alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:48AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clay County through 1130 AM CDT... At 1047 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Datto, or 9 miles west of Corning, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corning, Reyno, Success, Datto, Heelstring, Twin Oaks, Palatka and Hickoria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
